title: Make the app deployable and production-ready for going live

requirements.text: Remove the trap-only backend behavior so the canister can be deployed safely. Update `backend/main.mo` to no longer call `Runtime.trap("This should never be called. The backend actor must not be deployed")` and ensure the backend canister builds and deploys successfully.
acceptanceCriteria: `dfx deploy` (or equivalent deployment flow) succeeds without the backend trapping during initialization or when its public methods are called.
`backend/main.mo` no longer contains a public method that intentionally traps with the message "The backend actor must not be deployed".

requirements.text: Ensure the production frontend loads without missing critical static assets by adding the uploaded logo image as the canonical generated logo file(s) used by the UI and confirming all referenced `/assets/generated/*` and `/assets/gallery/*` paths used in `frontend/src/App.tsx` resolve at runtime.
acceptanceCriteria: The site renders without broken-image icons for the header/footer logo and hero wordmark/background.
All static asset paths referenced in `frontend/src/App.tsx` exist under `frontend/public` with matching filenames and extensions.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo` (no additional backend services).
Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or the immutable hook paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Buying/configuring a custom domain or DNS settings.
Adding new product features beyond making the existing site deployable and ensuring required assets are present.
Integrating third-party auth providers (only Internet Identity is supported).

required: Square logo derived from the uploaded image with transparent or clean dark background (ngfc-logo.dim_1024x1024.png)
Small favicon-style icon derived from the uploaded image (ngfc-favicon.dim_64x64.png)
